title: [CLIENT]Unlocked Radiant Wukong skin cannot be selected, and need to unlock again?
body: I have unlocked the Radiant Wukong skin on 01/26/2016. After updating, I found I can buy the skin in the store again. So, the first thing I did is buy it to see whether doing this would reduce my RP, and it turned out that my RP was deducted. The second thing I did, of course, is refund the purchase. Then, I found the skin, again appears in the store. I customized a game to see whether I can use the skin in a game. It turned out that I can select it, but at the last second before I entered the game, the selection was cancelled, and I entered the game with another skin I have.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Were you able to use the skin at any point? If not, please shoot a ticket over to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and get Radiant Wukong onto your account.
The day I first bought the skin, I used it once, which is on 01/26/2016. After that I did not use Wukong again.
You should also return his refund token ;)
That one's up to player support! :P
